m_descr:
Module to set presence switch according to connection state on Fritz!Box. You can use mac-address, ip-address or device-name to identify device in Fritz!Box.
Check github.com/Eweol/Zway-FritzBox-Presence/ for detailed documentation.
presence_device_label: Which device present you presence-state [mac-address] or [ip-address] or [device-name]:
presence_device_helper: MAC-address, IP-address or device-name of device in your Fritz!Box which show you are present or not.
